original_text: The oblation that ye shall offer unto the Lord shall be of five and twenty thousand in length, and of ten thousand in breadth.
korean_text: 곧 너희가 여호와께 드려 예물로 삼을 땅의 길이는 이만 오천 척이요 너비는 만 척이라

sentences.original_text: The oblation that ye shall offer unto the Lord
shall be of five and twenty thousand in length
and of ten thousand in breadth.
